info.name: UPOST-API
info.description:
Всі запити можуть передавати опційний параметр lang – мова, на якій повертати помилки. Параметр lang може приймати одне із значень:
  • en – англійська (за замовчуванням)
  • ru – російська
  • uk – українська

{ "status": true, "order": { "order_id": 1, "user_id": 1, "order_register_date": "2020-09-26", "order_name": "Universal WiFi IR Remote Controller Hub Voice Control For Air Conditioner TV DVD", "order_url": "universal-wifi-ir-remote-controller-hub-voice-control-for-air-conditioner-tv-dvd-1", "order_category": 11, "order_price": "18.29", "order_price_usd": "18.29", "order_currency": "$", "order_count": 1, "order_size": "ds", "order_weight": "asd", "order_product_link": "https://www.ebay.com/itm/Universal-WiFi-IR-Remote-Controller-Hub-Voice-Control-For-Air-Conditioner-TV-DVD/303631047427?_trkparms=aid%3D1110010%26algo%3DHOMESPLICE.DISCCARDS%26ao%3D1%26asc%3D20200220090753%26meid%3D91e97f134b9c4b00b6f9755dbaa62c33%26pid%3D100752%26rk%3D1%26rkt%3D1%26sd%3D133453520467%26itm%3D303631047427%26pmt%3D1%26noa%3D0%26pg%3D2047675%26algv%3Ddefault%26brand%3DUnbranded&_trksid=p2047675.c100752.m1982", "order_text": "\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\n\t\t\t
Universal WiFi IR Remote Controller Hub Voice Control For Air Conditioner TV DVD
Features:
Control\n IR appliances with Tuya Smart App or Smart Life App anywhere anytime. \nTurning your basic home devices into smart devices and making life \nsmarter and more convenient.
Supports 50,000+ IR (38KHz IR only, no \nRF) controlled devices, including your Air Conditioner, TV, TV Box, DVD,\n Audio, Personal Video Recorder, receiver and more.
With large IR data base which covers 98% IR remote function, it can update automatically on cloud.
Compatible\n with for Alexa/Echo, Google Home, IFTTT to voice control your TV, STB, \nAir Conditioner and Fans. The device only support 2.4G WiFi.
Learn \nyour DIY IR remote controller if appliance model is not available. \nOption to program your devices features if certain cloud data is \nunavailable.
Turn all IR remote controllers into one APP on \nsmartphone/tablet(The Max. Number of remote controller you can copy is \nunlimited).
You will never be bothered by a missing remote controller, say goodbye to chaos, and maintain an carefree life!

Specifications:
Product Name: WiFi-RF Universal Remote Controller
Power Input: DC5V/1A
IR Frequency: 38K
Range Cover: 360°
Wireless Standard: 2.4G 802.11 b/g/n
The Max. Number of remote controller you can copy: Unlimited
Control mode: Mobile APP \"Tuya/Smart Life\"
Platform: for Android, iOS
Material: ABS V0
Weight: About 120g

Package List:
1* WiFi-IR Remote
1* USB Cable
1* User Manual(English)
1* Reset Needle
\n\t\t
